features: STRONG TV WALL MOUNT BRACKET: Our TV mount is constructed of high-quality steel materials, fits most 37 to 75 inch TVs weighing up to 132lbs including Samsung, Sony, Panasonic, Toshiba, Sharp, LG, Philips, JVC, and more; compatible with VESA mounting holes 200x100mm to 600x400mm. Please check the screen size, weight and VESA pattern of your TV before purchase.

FULL MOTION ADJUSTMENT: This premium TV wall mount features to tilt +5°/-15°, swivel +/-45° (max. swivel angle depends on TV size) and level adjust +/-3°for maximum flexibility. Easily customize your viewing experience by directing the screen toward you.

SAVE MORE SPACE: Built with dual articulating arms, this tv mount extends out up to 14.84 inches for viewing and collapses to 3 inches to save space when not in use. Great solution of space saving for rooms with multiple viewing areas.

EASY INSTALLATION: This full motion tv mount includes a mounting template, instruction manual, and standard mounting hardware for frustration-free installation. Compatible with 12",16” wood studs, concrete, and brick wall mounting.

PURCHASE WITH CONFIDENCE: Pipishell guarantees the quality of tv mount to be free of defects in materials and workmanship. Please contact our US-based product support team if you have any questions or need assistance.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Pleased But Had To Tweek a Little
reviews.reviewText: This was my first time to install a TV wall mount. Read the reviews on this product, looked very sturdy, bought it. It's very easy to mount to the wall. The bolts that attach it to the wall are very substantial. The mount has great movement for the TV as well. Very easy to pull TV out and connect various inputs into back of TV if needed. However the wall mount bracket is not necessarily level with the arms that the TV hangs on. The installation instructions say there can be a 3° variance between the wall mount plate and the TV arms, so you will need to level it by the arms, not the wall bracket. This actually caused me to have to remount the bracket because my TV was not level. Watch out for this. But that was the only thing that I had to tweak. Other than that this is a great TV mount and I am very pleased. Great price point, very sturdy, very happy with this purchase. I would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Just what I was looking for, nice and sturdy. We also used (I forgot the name) bolts to make sure the mounts are securely bolted to the wall. Glad that it swivels so I can twist it to whichever direction I am in my home. Putting the mount up was easy too - but then again, I didn't install it. LOL So far, it's doing what it's supposed to do. I recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mount was perfect for my situation. I needed to raise my TV a couple of inches so my sound bar would fit below it on the mantle! Easy install. It took 4 of us to mount the 65” tv above the mantle. Very pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Solid and at a Great Price but lacks some features.
reviews.reviewText: I used this to hang a Samsung 65" so it's about 70 pounds. Compared to other similar units, this bracket is inexpensive, though it does lack a few features.Firstly, the wall mount is solid and easily supports the ~70 pound TV. No worries about it falling off, etc.Installation was not the easiest and the instructions do require some interpretation to get right. If you have some general handyman skills and are good with hand tools, it isn't a big deal. The main installation issue is if your wall studs don't line up with the back bracket. There is an available "extension bracket" but that isn't nearly big (wide) enough for some configurations. It's just 24 inches wide and needs to be 36. There are mentions in the instructions on installation with a nailer, but unless you are familiar with doing this it is better left to someone experienced. Once the bracket is on the wall, installing the VESA connector using the supplied spacers is a bit hit or miss, but since this is a one-size-fits-all bracket that can be forgiven. Note also that the latest Samsung TVs have a One Connect box hanging off the back of the TV which interferes with the VESA mount. Samsung provides a cable to fix this, but it's not an ideal solution, however that's a Samsung issue not a Pipishell problem.It should be somewhat obvious, but vertical placement and leveling this bracket is critical! This is because once installed, there is only an adjustment for angle (away from the wall) and left-right. I found that you must center the TV on the bracket to prevent it from listing to one side and looking crooked. There is no adjustment or fine tuning for this, hence the 4 star rating.This is a very good bracket at a great price and I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy and Great range of motion.
reviews.reviewText: I mounted a 55" LG tv. The kit included all the hardware needed to install. You do need to be able to locate studs and drill into them. The range of motion and sturdiness is fantastic. There are some less expensive mounts to consider, but this had good reviews. Definetly good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install and sturdy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to install. Stable and durable. Gives full function as specs define. Very satisfied with product.

reviews.reviewTitle: A sturdy and functional wall TV mount.
reviews.reviewText: After many years of wanting to install one of these, I did as I knew that I was not going to be moving to another place. Comes with a good template to mark the places to drill the holes. The included spirit level was not as accurate as my own and have read that from other reviewers. So, you might use your own. There is a +/- 3 degree rotational movement on one plate to compensate for this or if you were off when drilling the holes. Easy to do when drilling into concrete. Has a good range of motion for my use. Installed it at the appropriate height so don't strain the neck or eyes while watching. An excellent buy.

Heavy duty and well constructed. Easy to install, quality screws ,bolts and spacers. Comes with everything you need. Love the fact you can take the TV down so easily if you need to. Would definitely buy again. Fast delivery, good price

I recently bought this TV wall mount, and I'm thoroughly impressed by its performance. It excels in both security and ease of movement.The mount holds the TV securely in place, providing peace of mind that your investment is safe. Furthermore, it comes complete with all the necessary fasteners, ensuring a hassle-free installation process.The articulation and movement capabilities of this wall mount are exceptionally smooth, making adjustments a straightforward task. Overall, it's a reliable and versatile addition to any home entertainment setup, ensuring your TV is both secure and conveniently positioned.

reviews.reviewTitle: This Will HOLD a Big TV To the WALL!
reviews.reviewText: I bought a 43 pound 65" Samsung TV which required hanging above my fireplace. I called a company that installs these as I either dont have the strength or drive to try to hang a TV this big on the wall anymore. I ordered this TV mount as it advertised that it will hold up to a 75" TV. It came as advertised, and the installer quickly put it together. He was careful to INSURE that the unit was connected by lag bolts to 2 x 4 studs behind the wall or the TV will not stay up. Vitally important. This mount cannot be installed just into drywall with screws and inserts, it WILL NOT HOLD. Bottom line, its working great, it has excellent range of motion, allows tilting of the TV to adjust to many viewing angles and I would buy it and recommend it again. Good purchase. Great price
The mount is very solid tbh , also the video helps a lot to mount it I like that they tought about all the details . 5/5 I didn’t compare the prices so price wise I’m not sure .
